## getPrices() function

Retrieves all Stripe prices associated with the specified product.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getPrices(payments: StripePayments, productId: string): Promise<Price[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payments | [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) | A valid [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) object. |
|  productId | string | ID of the product to which the prices belong. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Price](./firestore-stripe-payments.price.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Resolves with an array of Stripe Price objects. Rejects if the specified product ID does not exist. If the product exists, but doesn't have any prices, resolves with the empty array.
